content: is the side you sew on the shell add eyes on head using puff paint embroidery or felt your baby turtle is done 🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢 mama turtle page 3 belly- 5mm hook brown belly will be done in continuous rounds note the belly may come out more bowl shape or slightly pointy in the middle when done but when its sewn together it will flatten out more r1 6 half_double_crochet into magic_ring 6 half_double_crochet r2 2 half_double_crochet around 12 half_double_crochet r3 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet* repeat ** around 18 half_double_crochet r4 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 2 times* repeat ** around 24 half_double_crochet r5 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 3 times* repeat ** around 30 half_double_crochet r6 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 4 times* repeat ** around 36 half_double_crochet r7 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 5 times* repeat ** around 42 half_double_crochet r8 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 6 times* repeat ** around 48 half_double_crochet r9 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 7 times* repeat ** around 54 half_double_crochet r10 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 8 times* repeat ** around 60 half_double_crochet r11 *2 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 9 times* repeat ** around 66 half_double_crochet slip_stitch into next st to close round fo head 4 25 mm hook green head will be done in continuous rounds r1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring 6 single_crochet r2 2 single_crochet around 12 single_crochet r3 *2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet* repeat ** around 18 single_crochet r4 *2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 times* repeat ** around 24 single_crochet page 4 r5 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet r6 *2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 3 times* repeat ** around 30 single_crochet r7-r8 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet r9 *2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 4 times* repeat ** around 36 single_crochet r10 single_crochet around 36 single_crochet if your wanting to use safety eyes place them now between r8-r9 r11 *decrease 1 single_crochet 4 times* repeat ** around 30 single_crochet r12 *decrease 1 single_crochet 3 times* repeat ** around 24 single_crochet r13 *decrease 1 single_crochet 2 times* repeat ** around 18 single_crochet r14 *decrease 1 single_crochet* repeat ** around 12 single_crochet start stuffing r15-r18 single_crochet around 12 single_crochet r19 2sc 1 single_crochet 2 times 16 single_crochet r20 2sc 1 single_crochet 3 times 20 single_crochet r21 single_crochet around 20 single_crochet fo finish stuffing back cover for neck- 4 25mm hook green r1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring 6 single_crochet r2 2 single_crochet around 12 single_crochet r3 *2sc 1 single_crochet* repeat ** around 18 single_crochet r4 *2sc 1 single_crochet 2 times* repeat ** around 24 single_crochet fo leave long tail for sewing take the back cover and put inside neck from r20 take tail and sew both pieces together fo and sew in all ends eyes- if you re not using safety eyes make 2 take 4 25 mm hook and black yarn create a magic_ring 5sc into circle slip_stitch into first st fo leave tail for sewing sew onto side of head front legs- 4 25 mm hook green make 2 you will be working in rounds page 5 r1 chain 7 single_crochet into the 2nd chain
